text: Carphalea is a genus of flowering plants in the family Rubiaceae.Jussieu, Antoine Laurent de. 1789. Genera Plantarum 198, Carphalea It is endemic to Madagascar. The species C. kirondron has been called "flaming beauty".https://florafaunaweb.nparks.gov.sg/special-pages/plant- detail.aspx?id=1786 == Species == * Carphalea angulata Baill. * Carphalea cloiselii Homolle * Carphalea kirondron Baill. ** Carphalea kirondron subsp. geayi (Homolle) Puff ** Carphalea kirondron subsp. kirondron * Carphalea linearifolia Homolle * Carphalea madagascariensis Lam. * Carphalea obovata * Carphalea pervilleana Baill. == References == == External links == * Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families, Carphalea Category:Rubiaceae genera Category:Knoxieae Category:Flora of Madagascar Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Carphalea
